item.title: PMI Data Shows US Manufacturing Expanding At Fastest Pace Since 2022
item.description: According to data from S&P Global, the August manufacturing PMI stood at 53.3, rising 3.5 points over the previous month.

item.title: Hedge Fund Emmett Reportedly Prepares Boardroom Challenge At Whitestone REIT
item.description: According to a report by Reuters, Emmett Investment Management may nominate directors to Whitestone REIT’s six-member board.

item.title: Alpha Modus Settles Patent Infringement Lawsuit Against Walgreens
item.description: Alpha Modus said the terms of the settlement are confidential, and the lawsuit will be dismissed with prejudice.

item.title: BREAKING: Cantor Equity Partners IV Stock Makes A Lukewarm Debut
item.description: The New York-based company offered 40 million shares for subscription, with the IPO priced at $10.

item.title: Morgan Stanley Believes HPE Is Undervalued After Juniper Deal: Retail Says Stock Is ‘Value Play In Tech Sector’
item.description: Morgan Stanley sees overlooked upside in Hewlett-Packard’s recent acquisition strategy and AI-driven demand environment.
